args:
After defeating Aether, the group holds a
farewell party at the Halidom. As the festivities
come to a close, it is finally time for Pecorine
to return to her own world. Praying they might
meet again one day, Pecorine, Mitsuba,
and Cleo share a final embrace.
At the Halidom's farewell party for Pecorine...
So this is fiend cuisine, yeah?\nGotta say, it looks pretty gnarly.
You don't even wanna know some'a the\ncrap I've eaten in my time, but this here\nmakes my oatmeal wanna hit the wall.
I know it doesn't look great, but I promise\nit's delicious. Give it a try.
If the two of you are done taste testing\nand throwing your opinions wildly about,\nperhaps you might pitch in and help.
Thank you, Lumière Pandora.\nOh, that reminds me. About your sister...
I'm sure it is worrisome not knowing what\nhappened to her, so if there is anything I\nmight do to help, you have but to ask.
You mean it? Thank you so much!
And I'm gonna be an even bigger help\nto you as well!
This should be quite the party.
Yes, she wanted to make sure things\ndidn't get gloomy at the prospect of her\nimpending departure.
Whoa, really?! How crazy is that?! ☆
I heard about what happened with Aether.\nWe owe her a great deal.
And the two of you as well. Thank you.
If I may, might we trouble you for a\nsmall performance tonight? It would\ncertainly help liven things up.
Of course. I'll go get ready.
Thanks for throwing me this farewell \nparty! Honestly, I'm kind of embarrassed\nby how all-out you went.
Well, what is the point otherwise?\nNot to mention, this is a fine chance to\nshare delicious fiend cuisine with all.
You know, I bet if Aether had someone to\nshare good food with, it would have let up\non that whole ＂destroy the world＂ thing.
CAUSE OF DEFEAT: ENEMY'S UNEXPECTED\nLEVEL OF MUTUAL AIDE AND SYNERGY.\nRESULT: INCONCEIVABLE.
HUMANS HAVE DIFFERENT VALUES.\nTHESE CAUSE STRIFE. STRIFE CAUSES\nTHEM TO DEVELOP WEAPONS LIKE ME.
WHY DID YOU HELP EACH OTHER?\nYOU ARE FROM DIFFERENT WORLDS.
Because we shared delicious food\ntogether, of course!
YOU FIGHT BECAUSE YOU REPLENISHED\nNUTRIENTS TOGETHER? ABSURD.
We may be from different worlds,\nbut we all understand the joy of\neating a tasty meal.
And by sharing that, we were able to\nunderstand each other.
SHARED EVENTS CAUSING JOY...\nPERHAPS I SEE THE LOGIC.
I think I understand why the Box of Hope\npicked you now, Pecorine.
Bonds from around the dinner table—\nand having someone here who valued\nthose bonds—helped us fight to the end.
Are you two ready to kick things off?\nThe food's gonna get cold.
Yeah, all this talking has got me\npreeeeetty peckish!
Very well. Let's get things started.
Everyone, join hands... All together now!
With the farewell party in full swing,\ntime races by. Until finally...
Well, we're connected: Pecorine's world\nis on the other side of this rift.
It's finally time to say goodbye...\nAnd yet, it's so hard!
This rift thing is gonna disappear once\nyou're back over there, right?
Correct. The rift's only purpose is to return\nthe person summoned by the Box of Hope\nto their original world.
I fear Lumière Pandora lacks the power\nto freely connect to other worlds herself.
But the Box of Hope exists to bring\noptimism to this world.
Pecorine, as long as you remain a shining\nexample of that, there's a chance the box\ncould connect to your world again one day.
Then this doesn't have to be\ngoodbye forever...
So turn those frowns around, everyone!
We shall. But next time, you must bring\nthe entire Gourmet Guild with you.
I'll make some new fiend cuisine and\ntake you to our favorite restaurants!
Sounds great! We'll sample all the\ndelicious food this world has to offer!
Can I give you all one more hug?
I'm sorry, but we cannot allow that.
Because this time, WE wanna hug YOU!
A surprise hug attack? Aw, I love you guys!
I'm so glad we all met, and I can't wait\nfor all of us to meet up again.
I cannot wait to sit down for a meal\nwith you again.
